case.title: Live In Relationship w/420 SBM Wanted by SBF w/HSV2 - 33 (Are you ready to relocate to the Burbs?)
case.text:
Black woman with HSV seeks LOVE with SBM, if you dont mention your HSV status I will not reply. I am not a bot, but I will only answer emails that include a detailed reply, and those who read my ad and understand what I am seeking and truly seeking the same
I am searching for a life partner and something leading to live in the suburbs of NY
If you cannot travel by car or bus please do not contact me, I don't live in the city
I am a homebody seeking the same in a mate
420 is ok, this is not a sugar mama situation if you are not employable, open to relocation and commuting we are not a match
